List heavy dependencies that should move to Suggests

Source: R/margot-core-exports.R
margot_optional_deps.Rd

List heavy dependencies that should move to Suggests

Usage

margot_optional_deps()

Value

Data frame of packages and their reasons for being optional

Examples

margot_optional_deps()
#>        package                                                      reason
#> 1        arrow      Large-scale data I/O - only needed for big simulations
#> 2      dagitty         DAG visualization - only needed for causal diagrams
#> 3       igraph Graph algorithms - only needed for dependency visualization
#> 4 future.apply     Parallel processing - only needed for large Monte Carlo
#> 5        ggdag                       DAG plotting - optional visualization
#> 6   DiagrammeR                      Flow diagrams - optional visualization
#> 7   visNetwork               Interactive networks - optional visualization
#>    current
#> 1 Suggests
#> 2 Not used
#> 3 Suggests
#> 4 Suggests
#> 5 Not used
#> 6 Not used
#> 7 Not used
